entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
